topic.topicDialog: If a new student needs to be added to a Teaching Group, or the group require access to an additional course or book, you can update the Teaching Group on-screen.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, click on the Switch to Admin mode button at the top of the screen and re-enter your password to access the Admin area.
Click on the name of the Teaching Group so that the details appear on the right hand side of the page.

On the initial screen, you can add or edit a Group Code, make sure 'Enable Group code' is ticked to activate it.

For more editing options, click on the drop down arrow.

From this drop down list, you have the option to:

Edit this Teaching Group - this is useful for changing the name or description.

Delete this Teaching Group

Add Student or a Teacher to this Teaching Group

Add a Course to this Teaching Group - use this option to add Kerboodle Books to the group.
